T11bsa072_u:6: iha khalu prekṣāpūrvakāriṇo 'rthijanāḥ sarvapuruṣārthasiddhinimittaṃ pramāṇamanusarantīti pramāṇamādau vyutpādyate /
T11bsa072_u:19: nanu jñānaṃ kartṛ puruṣaṃ prayojyamartha karmabhūtaṃ yadi kadācinna prāpayati tatkathamaprāpakatvāt pramāṇaṃ syāt? ucyate /
T11bsa072_u:20: na hi jñānena puruṣo gale pādukānyāyena balādarthe pravartayitavyaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:21: api tvevaṃbhūtamidaṃ vatusvarūpaṃ nānyathetyanenākāreṇa niścayo janayitavyaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:24: puruṣastu tatra prayojanavaśāt pravartatāmṛte prayojanaṃ na pravartatām,
T11bsa072_u:34: tato 'nyad dṛṣṭamanyat prāpyata ityapratītaprāpaṇāt kathaṃ prāmāṇyamasya saṃgacchatām /
T11bsa072_u:35: na, yadi nāma vastuto 'nyadeva prāpyate tathāpi dṛṣṭameva mayā prāptamityekatvādhyavasāyāt pratītaprāpaṇamabhidhīyate /
T11bsa072_u:44: tathā hi - yadi nāma mandabuddhirutpattivaśādavisaṃvādakatvaṃ jñānasya nāvadhārayituṃ samarthaḥ,
T11bsa072_u:45: tathāpi dāhapākāvagāhanasnānapānonmajjanāddyarthakriyāṃ dūrato 'nubhavato narasya darśanenoccalad dhūmādidarśanena cāvadhārayati /
T11bsa072_u:48: yadyavisaṃvādalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ tadā śrotrajñānasyādhigatārthāprāpakatvāt kathaṃ prāmāṇyamini cet? na /
T11bsa072_u:57: yadi nāma tasyaiva nāsti sandeho me vartata iti tathāpi sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvādyuktaḥ sandeho bhavan kena vāryate iti / tasmāt
T11bsa072_u:60: ata eva tu pratyakṣasya svataḥ prāmāṇyam /
T11bsa072_u:62: yogijñānasya svasaṃvedanasya ca svata eva prāmāṇyam /
T11bsa072_u:63: anumānasya tu niścayātmakatvāt svata eva pramāṇyam /
T11bsa072_u:65: tenāyamarthaḥ- prathamata eva yadvijñānaṃ viṣaye pravṛttaṃ tadeva pramāṇam,
T11bsa072_u:68: yathā ghaṭaṃ nirvikalpakena jñānena dṛṣṭvā paścāttasminneva viṣaye ghaṭo 'yamiti savikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ smaraṇarūpam,
T11bsa072_u:69: yathā vā parvatādau dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā vahniratretyanumānajñānānantaraṃ punarapi tatraiva vahniratretyanumānajñānam /
T11bsa072_u:71: samyagjñānaṃ pramāṇamityukte sāmarthyājjaḍasvabhāvasyendriyādeḥ paricchedakatvābhāvāt prāmāṇyaṃ nirastam paricchedakatvaṃ hi boddhṛtvam /
T11bsa072_u:80: nanu yadyakṣāśritaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tadā mānasādi vakṣyamāṇaṃ jñānatrayamindriyādanutpatteḥ pratyakṣaṃ na syāt?
T11bsa072_u:83: tataḥ svasaṃvedanādikamapi jñānaṃ svasaṃvedanarūpamartha sākṣātkarotīti pratyakṣaśabdavācyaṃ siddhyatīti //
T11bsa072_u:88: liṅgagrahaṇaliṅgaliṅgisambandhasmaraṇayoḥ paścāt yadvijñānaṃ parvatādau dharmiṇi parokṣavastvālambakaṃ tadevānumānaśabdenābhidhīyate /
T11bsa072_u:91: dvividhavacanena ekaṃ trīṇi catvāri pañca ṣaḍhiti vipratipattayo nirasyante /
T11bsa072_u:97: dvividhavacanena dvitve prāpte pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ceti punaryaduktaṃ tadanyathādvitvanirāsārtham /
T11bsa072_u:98: tathā hi vaiyāka raṇo brūte pratyakṣaṃ śābdaṃ ceti pramāṇadvayam //
T11bsa072_u:101: tathā hi - sa khalu pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ parapratipādanāya praṇayati /
T11bsa072_u:107: nānumānaṃ pramāṇamiti ca bruvan kathaṃ nāma nonmattaścārvākaḥ syāt?
T11bsa072_u:111: na ca śabdānāṃ bāhyārthena saha kaścitsambandho 'sti /
T11bsa072_u:112: tathā hi - śabdārthayoḥ sambandho bhavan tādātmyaṃ tadutpattirarvā bhavet /
T11bsa072_u:120: tathā hi - śabdavyāpāramantareṇa svahetoreva mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍasalilakulālacakrādeḥ sakāśādutpadyamāno ghaṭādirartho dṛśyate /
T11bsa072_u:122: atha tādātmyatadutpattibhyāmanya eva vācyāvācakatvalakṣaṇaḥ śabdārthayoḥ vāstavaḥ sambandhadho 'sti /
T11bsa072_u:124: yogyatā mātreṇaiva pradīpāt ghaṭādipratītivat na caitadasti /
T11bsa072_u:125: tathā hi - abhinavo nālikeradvīpādāyātaḥ pumānagniśabdaṃ śrutvāpyagniśabdānna kiñcidartha pratyetīti /
T11bsa072_u:126: atha tāṃstān saṃketānapekṣya tattadarthapratyāyanayogya evāyaṃ śabdo jāyata ityucyate /
T11bsa072_u:133: tathā ca so 'pi kena sambandhena tayoḥ sambaddha iti praṣṭavyaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:138: athāsambaddha eva śabdārthayoḥ samvandha iti cet /
T11bsa072_u:140: yo na sambaddhaḥ sa kathaṃ sambandho bhavati ghaṭasyeva paṭaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:141: atha vaktavyaṃ sambandhasya tādṛśa eva svabhāvaḥ,
T11bsa072_u:145: yathāgnerevāyamīdṛśaḥ svabhāvo yaduta dāhakatvaṃ nāma nānyasyākāśādeḥ /
T11bsa072_u:146: sambandhasiddhau tu pramāṇaṃ kiñcinnirupayanto na paśyāmaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:147: na caivaṃ vaktavyaṃ śabdaśaktisvabhāvādeva śabdānāṃ niyatārthāvyabhicāritvamiti /
T11bsa072_u:148: tathā hi - yadi ghaṭa ityayaṃ śabdaḥ svabhāvādeva kambugrīvākāraṃ vārisaṃdhāraṇasamartha padārthamabhidadhāti,
T11bsa072_u:150: na hi śālibījaṃ svahetoraṅkurajananasvabhāvamutpannaṃ saṃketāntamapekṣya gardabhaṃ janayituṃ samartha syāt /
T11bsa072_u:157: sarāgā api vītarāgā iva ceṣṭanta iti nyāyātkathamāptatvaṃ niścīyatāmiti /
T11bsa072_u:158: samvandhadūṣaṇena ca vaidikaśabdānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ nirastamiti pṛthaṅnoktam /
T11bsa072_u:159: kathaṃ tarhi sarvo 'yamasandigdho laukiko vyavahāra iti cet /
T11bsa072_u:160: tathā tathā saṃketena vivakṣāvaśāditi na kācit kṣatiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:164: yaḥ pratipattā gāṃ jānāti na gavayam,
T11bsa072_u:165: sa ca apadiṣṭaḥ svāminā araṇyaṃ gatvā gavayamānayeti /
T11bsa072_u:166: sa ca gavayaśabdavācyamarthamajānāno vanecaramanyaṃ tajjñaṃ puruṣaṃ pṛṣṭavān,
T11bsa072_u:168: sa cāha yādṛśī gaustādṛśo gavaya iti /
T11bsa072_u:169: tasyāraṇyagatasya preṣyapuruṣasya atideśa vākyārthasmaraṇasahakāri gavayasārūpyajñānaṃ kartṛ ayamasau gavayaśabdavācyo 'rtha iti pratipattiṃ phalasvarūpāṃ janayatpramāṇam /
T11bsa072_u:172: na cāsya nipuṇamapi nirupayanto viṣayaṃ saṃpaśyāmaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:173: tathā hi - samākhyā nāma sambandhaḥ tasya viṣayo varṇyate /
T11bsa072_u:177: kiṃ ca - sa hi sambandhaḥ sambadhibhyāṃ bhinno 'bhinno vā /
T11bsa072_u:178: yadā bhinnastadā tayoḥ sambandhaḥ kena sambandheneti vācyam /
T11bsa072_u:184: yataḥ sambaddhāvetāviti buddhiḥ svahetubalāt sambaddhavastudvayādapi sambhāvyamānā na sambandhāntaramākṣiptuṃ prabhavati //
T11bsa072_u:187: tathā hi, sādṛśyaviśiṣṭaḥ piṇḍaḥ piṇḍaviśiṣṭaṃ vā sādṛśyamupamānasya viṣayastena varṇyate /
T11bsa072_u:188: na ca sadṛśavastuno 'tiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyate,
T11bsa072_u:190: tathā hi - yadi sadṛśādatiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ dṛśyaṃ syāt tadā dṛśyānulambhagrastametat /
T11bsa072_u:191: athādṛśyaṃ tadā tatpratibaddhaliṅgābhāvāt anumānādapi kathaṃ tatsiddhiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:192: sādṛśyapratyayastu svahetostathotpannena sadṛśavastunāpi kriyamāṇo ghaṭata iti na tatpratyayādapi tatsiddhiryuktā /
T11bsa072_u:194: yataḥ pramāṇāntarasiddhayoreva sādṛśyapiṇḍaoyoryo viśeṣaṇaviṣeṣyabhāvastasyopamānaviṣayatvaṃ tena vādinā parikalddhapyate /
T11bsa072_u:198: tathā hi pratyakṣādipratīto yo 'rthaḥ sa yena vinā nopapadyate tasyārthasya kalpanamarthāpattirityarthāpatterlakṣaṇam /
T11bsa072_u:200: tasya yadi parikalpyamānena parokṣārthena saha kaścittādāmyalakṣaṇaḥ tadutpattilakṣaṇo
T11bsa072_u:201: va pratibandho 'sti tadā svabhāvaliṅgajā kāryaliṅgajā vāsau pratipattirityarthāpattiranumānameva /
T11bsa072_u:215: jñānamapi kiṃ jñānamātram ekajñānasaṃsargivastuno jñānaṃ vā?
T11bsa072_u:217: tasya sarvaśaktiśūnyatvāt paricchedakatvaṃ vā kathaṃ bhavet?
T11bsa072_u:223: na hi jaḍarūpaṃ śakaṭādikaṃ ghaṭaṃ paricchinattīti kvāpi dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ veti /
T11bsa072_u:231: yathā vijñapuruṣasya so 'yaṃ ghaṭa iti pratītiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:234: nanu bālamūkādīnāmantarjalpākāraṃ kalpanājñānamastīti kuto niścetavyamiti ceta,
T11bsa072_u:238: bālamūkādivijñānasya kalpanātva sūcanena bhattoktālocanājñānaṃ savikalpakamiti pratipāditaṃ bhavati /
T11bsa072_u:239: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ kalpanāvibhramātmakaṃ ca jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na syāditi ceta? na /
T11bsa072_u:240: arthasvarūpasākṣākāri hi jñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti sarvoṣāṃ prasiddham /
T11bsa072_u:243: artho hi grāhyatvāt jñānasya kāraṇam / yathoktam -
T11bsa072_u:244: bhinnakālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyamiti cet grāhyatāṃ viduḥ /
T11bsa072_u:248: na hi yadantareṇāpi yadbhavati tattasya kāryam,
T11bsa072_u:254: śābdyāṃ buddhāvarthasya pratyakṣa iva pratibhāsābhāvād nāsti kalpanāyā arthasākṣātkāritvam iti //
T11bsa072_u:256: na so 'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamādṛte /
T11bsa072_u:257: anuviddhamiva jñānaṃ sarva śabdena bhāsate // iti //
T11bsa072_u:259: tathāhi - ghaṭe purovartini uccāryamāṇe tatsamīpavarti bhūtalādijñānamuccāraṇarahitamanubhūyata eva /
T11bsa072_u:268: etena kāmalinaḥ śukle śaṃkhe pītapratibhāsi jñānaṃ,
T11bsa072_u:273: nanu yadi nāma tajjñānaṃ na pratyakṣaṃ kathaṃ tato vastuprāptiriti cet?
T11bsa072_u:277: taccaturvidhaṃ- indriyajñānaṃ mānasaṃ svasaṃdanaṃ yogijñānaṃ ceti /
T11bsa072_u:288: idaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ yatraiva svānurūpaṃ vikalpaṃ janayati tatraiva pramāṇam,
T11bsa072_u:298: tato yaduktaṃ pareṇātraḥ 'gṛhītagrāhitvamandhabadhirādyabhāvo yogijñānasyāpi mānasatvaprasaṅgaḥ avyavahāritvaṃ ca' iti /
T11bsa072_u:318: na kaściddoṣaḥ syādityāgamasyāpi viśuddhiranena pratipāditeti prayojanam //
T11bsa072_u:325: teṣāṃ sarvacittacaittānāmātmā saṃvidyate yena rūpeṇa tatsvarūpamātmasvarūpasākṣatkāritvāt svasaṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍhamabhrāntaṃ cocyate
T11bsa072_u:326: atra kecidāhuḥ - na ca cittacaittānāṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ ghaṭate,
T11bsa072_u:328: na ca suśikṣito 'pi naṭavaṭuḥ svaskandhamāroḍhuṃ śaknoti /
T11bsa072_u:330: na hi prajjvalito 'pi vahniskandha ātmānaṃ dahati /
T11bsa072_u:331: tathā cittacaittamapi kathamātmānaṃ vedayatu vedyavedakabhāvo hi karmakartṛbhāvaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:334: atrocyate, na karmakartṛbhāvena vedyavedakatvaṃ jñāne varṇyate /
T11bsa072_u:336: yathā pradipa ātmānaṃ prakāśayati tathā jñānamapi jaḍapadārthavilakṣaṇaṃ svahetoreva prakāśasvabhāvamupajāyamānaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ vyavasthāpyate
T11bsa072_u:343: na ca cittacaittānāṃ jñānāntareṇa prakāśyatvaṃ yujyate /
T11bsa072_u:344: tathā hi - na tāvatsamānakālabhāvinā jñānāntareṇa cittacaittaṃ prakāśyata iti ghaṭate,
T11bsa072_u:350: api ca yadi jñānaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ na syāt,
T11bsa072_u:358: na hi daṇḍāgrahaṇe daṇḍino grahaṇaṃ yuktisaṅgatam /
T11bsa072_u:364: kiṃ tarhi? cakṣurvijñānāsaṃvedane kathaṃ jñāyatāmiti codyamakṣatameva //
T11bsa072_u:375: prākaṭyasyāpi jñānāt pṛthaktve viṣayarūpatāyāṃ vyaktau jaḍarūpatā,
T11bsa072_u:384: parokṣaṃ yadi tat jñānaṃ jñātamityeva tatkutaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:385: parokṣasya svarūpaṃ kastasya lakṣayituṃ kṣamaḥ // iti //
T11bsa072_u:395: taduktam - svarūpe sarvamabhrāntaṃ pararūpe viparyayaḥ / iti //
T11bsa072_u:397: tadā svahetoreva prakāśasvabhāvādutpannāḥ santaḥ prakāśanta iti svīkartavyam //
T11bsa072_u:420: atrocyate - avastuviṣayo 'pi vikalpo vastvadhyavasyatīti bhāvanāto vastuna evātra sphuṭībhāvaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:430: nityaṃ tamāhurvidvāṃso yaḥ svabhāvo na naśyati /
T11bsa072_u:432: nityavādapi kiṃ tasya kastāṃ kṣapayituṃ kṣamaḥ // iti //
T11bsa072_u:433: yattu śarīritve sukhaduḥkhayorbhāvādanugrahanigrahāt śarīrī rāgādivirahānmukta śceti vighaṭanamuktaṃ,
T11bsa072_u:443: ātmānaṃ nityaṃ paśyata eva sukhābhikāṅkṣaṇādisukhaheturātmīyaḥ syāt /
T11bsa072_u:449: tasmājjīvaccharīre satyapi avidyāvirahāt sarvasaṅgavirahalakṣaṇā muktirvītarāgāṇāṃ bhavatīti sarvaṃ susthitam /
T11bsa072_u:452: tasya caturvidhasya pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayo boddhavyaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:458: nanu yadi svalakṣaṇameva pratyakṣasya viṣayo na sāmānyaṃ tadānīṃ dhūmadahanasāmānyayorvyāptiḥ kathaṃ pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyatām?
T11bsa072_u:461: na tvanyayogavyavacchedena svalakṣaṇameva tasya viṣaya iti /
T11bsa072_u:465: tatra pratyakṣasya pratibhāsamānaṃ svalakṣaṇam eko grāhyaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:469: tatraikasyāmeva ghaṭādivyaktau sajātīyavyāvṛttāyāmanekakṣaṇasamudāyaḥ sāmānyaṃ ūrdhvatālakṣaṇaṃ sādhanapratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:473: pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaviṣayapratipādane paroktāḥ ṣaṭ padārthā na viṣayā ityuktam yathā - avayavidravyaṃ,
T11bsa072_u:482: tathā hi - ghaṭādau paridṛśyamāne pūrvāparādibhāgaṃ vihāya nānyatkiñcidekamavayavidravyamupalabhāmahe /
T11bsa072_u:484: bhāgā eva hi bhāsante sanniviṣṭāstathā tathā /
T11bsa072_u:488: nanu pramitirūpāṃ kriyāṃ phalabhūtāṃ niṣpādayajjñānaṃ pramāṇamiti prasiddham /
T11bsa072_u:491: ucyate - iha nīlāderarthāt jñānaṃ dvirūpamutpadyate nīlākāraṃ,
T11bsa072_u:498: etacca vikalpapratyayena bhinnaṃ vyavasthāpyate paramārthatastu nāstyeva bhedaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:504: tadānākāratvena sarvatra viṣaye tulyatvāt vibhāgena viṣayavyavasthā na sidhyati /
T11bsa072_u:505: yatpunaḥ kecidāhuḥ - pūrvaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ uttaraṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaphalamiti,
T11bsa072_u:507: tathā hi prathamakṣaṇabhāvi tāvajjñānaṃ pramāṇaphalabhūtasya dvitīyajñānasyānutpatteḥ,
T11bsa072_u:508: phalabhūtajñānotpattau ca pūrvasya kṣaṇikatvena vināśāt kathaṃ ghaṭādiviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavati?
T11bsa072_u:519: parvatādau dharmiṇi dhūmādikaṃ dṛṣṭvā yasya pratipattuḥ vahnijñānamutpadyate,
T11bsa072_u:520: sa eva tena jñānena parokṣamarthaṃ pratipadyate nānya iti svārthānumānamucyate /
T11bsa072_u:523: trirūpaliṅgapratipādakaṃ vacanaṃ paraṃ pratipādayati jñāpayatīti kṛtvā vacanamapyanumānaśabdenocyate,
T11bsa072_u:533: samprati liṅgasya trirūpatvamucyate - anumeye satvameva niścitam /
T11bsa072_u:552: sapakṣa eva satvaṃ niścitamityanvayasaṃjñakaṃ dvitīyaṃ rūpam /
T11bsa072_u:559: tacca sapakṣe ākāśādau vipakṣe ca ghaṭādau sarvatrāstīti sādhāraṇamucyate /
T11bsa072_u:560: sattvaśabdāt pūrvasminnevakāreṇa sarvasapakṣāvyāpino 'pi prayatnānantarīyakasya hetutvaṃ kathitam /
T11bsa072_u:564: iṣṭapuruṣe sapakṣe ca vaktṛtvamasarvajñatvena vyāptamavyāptaṃ vā na jñāyate //
T11bsa072_u:577: vipakṣa eva yo nāsti sa hetuḥ /
T11bsa072_u:586: yadi nāma pāṣaṇakhaṇḍādubhayaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ tathāpi na jñāyate kimavītarāgatvanivṛttyā pāṣaṇakhaṇḍādbaktṛtvaṃ nivṛttaṃ,
T11bsa072_u:595: nanu sapakṣa eva sattyamityukte sāmārthyādevāsapakṣe cāsattvamiti gamyate /
T11bsa072_u:598: te ca trividha eva vipakṣo bhavatīti manyante /
T11bsa072_u:602: anvayaprayogo vyatirekaprayogo vā niyamavānekaḥ prayoktavyo na dvāvapīti /
T11bsa072_u:606: trīṇi rūpāṇi yeṣāṃ tāni trirūpāṇi trīṇyeva liṅgāni /
T11bsa072_u:612: tatra kāryaṃ yathā - yatra dhūmastatrāgniryathā mahānase,
T11bsa072_u:615: anye tu pratijñāhetudṛṣṭāntopanayanigamanaṃ ceti pañcāvayavaṃ sādhanavākyamāhuḥ /
T11bsa072_u:626: yatra pratijñaiva nāsti tatra pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanaṃ nigamanaṃ kuto bhaviṣyatīti sarvamāmūlaṃ viśīrṇam /
T11bsa072_u:644: svabhāvo yathā - svabhāvaḥ svasattāmātrabhāvini sādhyadharme yo heturucyate sa tasya sādhyasya dharmasya svabhāvo boddhavyaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:653: abhede 'pi kaścitpratipattā śiṃśapāvyavahāraṃ kṛtvā tatra vṛkṣavyavahāraṃ prāk kṛtamapi vyāmohāt kiñcidāropya punarna karoti /
T11bsa072_u:655: tasmādetayoḥ paramārthata ekatve 'pi vikalpabuddhau vyāvṛttisamāśrayeṇa samutpannāyāṃ bhedena pratibhāsanāt sādhyasādhanatvaṃ na virudhyata iti //
T11bsa072_u:661: ekendriyajñānagrāhyo pradeśādāvupalabhyamāne yadi ghaṭaḥ syāt dṛśya eva bhavediti /
T11bsa072_u:665: sa caikajñānasaṃsargipadārthādekajñānasaṃsargipadārthopalambhādvā niścīyata iti tadubhayaṃ karmakartṛbhāvena paryudāsavṛttyā anupalabdhirucyate,
T11bsa072_u:667: taddhi svayameva na kiñciditi kathaṃ sādhanaṃ syāt /
T11bsa072_u:670: tasmānniṣedhyādanyadviśiṣṭameva vastudvayaṃ pradeśaḥ pradeśajñānaṃ vānupalabdhiriti sthitam /
T11bsa072_u:675: tathā hi - kaścinmūḍho rajaḥprabhṛtiṣu sāṃkhyaprasiddheṣu guṇeṣvanupalambhena pravarttitābhāvabyavahāro
T11bsa072_u:676: 'pi punaḥ sarvaṃ sarvatrāstīti svasiddhāntābhyāsāt kvāpi pradeśādau ghaṭānupalambhe
T11bsa072_u:677: satyapi nābhāvavyavahāraṃ karotītyanupalambhena trividho vyavahāraḥ kāryate /
T11bsa072_u:681: anupalabdhertādātmyatadutpattisambandhanirūpaṇam anupalambhasya karmadharmapakṣe sādhyena saha [sādṛśye] tādātmyalakṣaṇa eva sambandho boddhavyaḥ
T11bsa072_u:684: asadvyavahārayogyatvaṃ ca tasya svabhāvaḥ [na kārya] jñānaṃ tu pradeśasya kāryamiti //
T11bsa072_u:704: tadā dṛśyānupalabdhiḥ sākṣātprayoktuṃ na śakyata iti kāryānupalabdhyādayaḥ prayujyante /
T11bsa072_u:721: pratiṣedhyasy śītasparśasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ tasya viruddho vahniḥ tasya cehopalabdhiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:747: (11) kāraṇaviruddhakāryopalabdhiryathā - na romaharṣādiviśeṣayukta sparśavānayaṃ pradeśo dhūmāditi /
T11bsa072_u:759: pratiṣedhyasya hi vahneryaḥ svabhāvastasya viruddhaṃ śītam,
T11bsa072_u:779: ete ca kāryānupalabdhyādayaḥ pañcadaśa prayogāḥ svabhāvānupalabdhisvabhāvā eva pratipattavyāḥ /
T11bsa072_u:799: saṃskṛtasya sarvasya kṣaṇika tvasamarthanaṃ ca tatra svabhāvahetoḥ sādharmyavantaṃ prayogaṃ darśayituṃ sautrāntikamatamāśritya bhagavatā yaduktaṃ
T11bsa072_u:802: sametya sambhūya hetupratyayaiḥ kṛtaṃ vastujātaṃ saṃskṛtam /
T11bsa072_u:805: `sarvaṃ tāvat ghaṭādikaṃ vastu mudgarādisannidhau nāśaṃ gacchat dṛśyate /
T11bsa072_u:806: tatra yena svarūpeṇa antyāvasthāyāṃ ghaṭādikaṃ vinaśyati taccet svarūpamutpannamātrasya vidyate tadānīmutpādānantarameva tena vinaṣṭavyamiti vyaktamasya kṣaṇikatvam /'
T11bsa072_u:809: `evaṃ tarhi mudgarādisannidhāne ca eṣa eva asya svabhava iti punarapyanena tāvantameva kālaṃ sthātavyam,
T11bsa072_u:811: tasmāt kṣaṇadvayasthāyitvenāpyutpattau prathamakṣaṇavad dvitīyakṣaṇe 'pi kṣaṇadvayasthāyitvāt punaraparaṃ kṣaṇadvayamavatiṣṭheta /
T11bsa072_u:817: vināśaśca tasya virodhina balena kriyata iti?
T11bsa072_u:818: na hyetatsambhavati jīvati devadatto maraṇaṃ cāsya bhavatīti /
T11bsa072_u:821: na hi mriyate cāmaraṇadharmā ceti yujyate vaktum /
T11bsa072_u:827: prayogaḥ punarevaṃ kartavyaḥ - yadyat vinaśvarasvarūpaṃ tattadanantarānavasthāyi yathā antyakṣaṇavartighaṭasya svarūpam /
T11bsa072_u:831: kathaṃ tarhi sa evāyamiti pratyabhijñānaṃ syāt? ucyate -
T11bsa072_u:833: tenākāreṇa vailakṣaṇyasyābhāvād bhāvena cāvyavadhānāt bhede 'pi sa evāyamityabhedādhyavasāyapratyayaḥ pṛthagjanānāṃ prasūyate /
T11bsa072_u:834: atyantabhinneṣvapi ca lūnapunarjātakuśakeśādiṣvapi dṛṣṭa eva sa evāyamiti pratyayaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:836: tasmātsarva saṃskṛtaṃ kṣaṇikamiti siddhamevaitat nirviśeṣaṇasya svabhāvahetorayaṃ prayoga iti //
T11bsa072_u:850: yadā saiva vyāvṛttirvyāvṛttyantaravyavacchedena vyatiriktocyate bhāvasyotpattiriti tadā kalpitena bhedena svabhāvabhūtadharmeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāvo hetuḥ /
T11bsa072_u:852: tathā bhinnaviśeṣaṇasya prayogaḥ - yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ,
T11bsa072_u:855: yathā cātra citragośabde bhinnaviśeṣaṇavācako 'sti na tathā kṛtakaśabde bhinnaviśeṣaṇavācakaṃ kimapyasti /
T11bsa072_u:857: ucyate - apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi svabhāvaniṣpattau bhāvaḥ kṛtakaḥ ityucyate /
T11bsa072_u:858: tatraḥ kṛtakaśabdaḥ paravyāpārasāpekṣaṃ svabhābaṃ prakṛtyaiva vadan bhinnaviśeṣaṇamevāha //
T11bsa072_u:860: prayuktabhinnaviśeṣaṇasya svabhāvasya prayogaḥ - yaḥ pratyayabhedabhedī sa kṛtakaḥ,
T11bsa072_u:864: tasya bhedastena bhettuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa pratyayabhedabhedī /
T11bsa072_u:865: kāraṇamahattvena mahattvaṃ kāraṇālpatvenālpatvaṃ yasyetyarthaḥ pratyayabhedabhediśabdasya bhinnaviśeṣaṇavācakasyātra prayuktatvāt prayuktabhinnaviśeṣaṇo 'yam /
T11bsa072_u:866: svabhāvahetoḥ nānāprabhedadarśanaṃ ca vyāmohanivṛttaye dharmabhedakalpanayāpi svabhāvahetureva prayujyata iti pratipādayitum /
T11bsa072_u:868: svabhāvahetorvaidharmyavān prayogo yathā - yadyadānantarānavasthāyi na bhavati na tattadā vinaśvararūpaṃ,
T11bsa072_u:871: vyatirekaprayoge sādhanābhāvena sādhyābhāvasya vyāptatvāt sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyato bhavatīti boddhavyam /
T11bsa072_u:872: tathāparo 'pi vaidharmyavān prayogaḥ - yatra kṣaṇikatvaṃ nāsti tatra sattvamapi nāsti,
T11bsa072_u:881: yatra kṛtakatvaṃ nāsti tatra pratyayabhedabheditvamapi nāsti,
T11bsa072_u:885: kāryahetoḥ sādharmyavān prayogo yathā - yatra yatra dhūmastatra tatrāgniḥ,
T11bsa072_u:888: kāryaheturapi pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ siddha eva kāryakāraṇabhāve sati kāraṇe sādhye prayoktavyaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:889: vaidharmyaprayogo yathā asatyagnau na bhavatyeva dhūmaḥ yathā - mahāhrade /
T11bsa072_u:892: anupalabdheḥ sādharmyavan prayogo 'vayavinirākaraṇāya yathā - yadyatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate tattatrāsadvyavahārayogyam,
T11bsa072_u:896: anupalabdhervaidharmyavān prayogo yathā - yatsadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ tadupalabhyata eva,
T11bsa072_u:900: sarvatra sādharmyavati sādhanavākye sādhyena sādhanaṃ vyāptam /
T11bsa072_u:901: baidharmyavati [punaḥ] sādhanavākye sādhanābhāvena sādhyābhāvo vyāpta iti pratipattavyam /
T11bsa072_u:903: niyatatvakathanaṃ sādhyābhāvasya sādhanābhāve niyatatvakathanaṃ nāma vyāptirabhidhīyate /
T11bsa072_u:904: tataḥ pramāṇena vyāptisiddhau satyāṃ nedaṃ kvāpi śaṅkanīyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca syāta,
T11bsa072_u:905: sādhyaṃ ca tatra dharmiṇi na syāditi /
T11bsa072_u:907: yatra pramāṇena sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptireva na siddhā,
T11bsa072_u:911: ihānyaḥ sarvajño bhagavān bhavatu vā mā bhūt,
T11bsa072_u:913: tathā hi, loke trayaḥ khalu bhāvāḥ kecinniścitakartṛkāḥ,
T11bsa072_u:920: tatra ye dṛśyamānotpattayo vanaspatyādayo ye ca cirotpannā viśvambharādayaḥ te sarve sandigdhakartṛtvena vyavatiṣṭhamānā buddhimatkartṛkāḥ kāryatvāt,
T11bsa072_u:928: tathāhi - kārya tāvat buddhimataḥ kumbhakārādupajāyamānaṃ bhūyodarśanasahāyena mānasa pratyakṣeṇopalabdham /
T11bsa072_u:929: tadyadi buddhimantareṇāpi syāt tadānīṃ buddhimataḥ sakāśātkadācidapi nopajāyeta /
T11bsa072_u:931: tasmānnedaṃ kvāpi śaṅkanīyaṃ kāryaṃ ca syāt na buddhimaddhetukamiti /
T11bsa072_u:932: atredamabhidhīte - sādhanaṃ khalu sarvatra sādhyasādhanayoḥ sarvopasaṃhareṇa pramāṇena vyāptau siddhāyāṃ sādhyaṃ gamayediti sarvavādisammatam
T11bsa072_u:933: tatra yadi dṛsyaśarīraviśiṣṭena buddhimatā vyāptirgṛhyate tadā tathābhūtasādhyamantareṇāpi jāyamāne tṛṇādau kāryatvasya darśanāt prameyatvādivat sādhāraṇānaikāntiko 'yaṃ hetuḥ /
T11bsa072_u:935: na hi vyabhicāraviṣaya eva pakṣo bhavitumarhati-
T11bsa072_u:938: evaṃ dhūme 'pi vyabhicāro vaktuṃ sulabha eva? tanna /
T11bsa072_u:939: aśakyārohaṇatvena parvate dahanasya draṣṭumaśakyatvāt yuktaṃ tatra sandigdhaviṣayatvam /
T11bsa072_u:940: prastute tu dṛśyaśarīraviśiṣṭena buddhimatā vyāptau gṛhyamāṇāyāṃ dṛśyānupalambhena buddhimato bādho bhavatīti yuktam /
T11bsa072_u:941: atha dṛśyaśarīreṇa buddhimanmātreṇa vā vyāptiravagamyate tadā adṛśyasya buddhimanmātrasya vā sādhyasya dṛśyānupalambhena vyatirekāsiddheḥ sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttiko 'yaṃ hetuḥ /
T11bsa072_u:942: sādhyābhāvaprayuktasya sādhānābhāvasya [kāśadāva] siddhatvena vyāpterabhāvāt tathā coktam jñānaśrīmitrapādaiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:957: ato dhūmasya dahanena saha sambandhe bhaviṣyatyupādhiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:971: dhūmādikaṃ vastu svābhāvika sambandhena sambaddhaṃ na sarvam' iti /
T11bsa072_u:973: yathā dhūmākhyaṃ vastu dahanāyattamiti pramāṇasiddhiṃ tathā kiṃ svābhāvikasambandho 'pi pramāṇasiddhaḥ,
T11bsa072_u:977: svahetorvā bhūtaḥ ahetuko vā iti trayo vikalpāḥ /
T11bsa072_u:984: kiñca sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā dṛṣṭāntamātramastīti na vyāptisiddhiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:989: tathāhi - na tāvadākāśe sādhyābhāvena sadhanābhāvaḥ pratīyate /
T11bsa072_u:990: ākāśe hi yathā buddhimatkāraṇanivṛttistathā acetanasyāpi kāraṇasya nivṛttirnāstyeva /
T11bsa072_u:993: nāpi ghaṭe kāryatvasya buddhimadanvayadarśanādākāśe 'pi buddhimadabhāvādeva kāryatvābhāvo vaktuṃ yujyate,
T11bsa072_u:994: yasmādanayostādātmyaṃ tadutpattiranyo vā svābhāvikādisambandhaḥ pūrvapramāṇena na prasādhitaḥ syādityuktam /
T11bsa072_u:997: tathā hi, vipakṣe heturnopalabhyata ityanena tadupalambhakapramāṇa nivṛttirucyate /
T11bsa072_u:1002: yadi punaḥ pramāṇasattayā prameyasattā vyāptā syāt,
T11bsa072_u:1011: `viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣa eva saṃśayo bhavati tato yathādarśanameva śaṅkitumucitam' iti /
T11bsa072_u:1014: tathā hi - [kāryatvadhūmatvayoḥ] tādātmyatadutpattisambandha viyogitvena sādhāraṇena dharmeṇa prameyatvadhūmatvakāryatvādīnāṃ tanmatenāpi sajātīyatvam
T11bsa072_u:1021: tadidānīṃ svamatenaivānena vādinā niranuyojyānuyogalakṣaṇena nigrahasthānenātmā bādhita ityupekṣaṇiyo 'yaṃ devānāṃ priyaḥ //
T11bsa072_u:1023: nanu yadi dṛśyāgnidhūmasāmānyayoriva dṛśyātmanoreva kāryakāraṇasāmānyayoḥ pratyakṣānulambhato vyāptistadā santānāntarānumānaṃ na syāt,
T11bsa072_u:1027: na caivaṃ vyāvahārikendriyapratyakṣamātrabuddhimanmātraṃ jaṭharacitrasādhāraṇaṃ vahnimātraṃ vā gocaro yujyate,
T11bsa072_u:1029: tasmāt dṛśyenaiva vahninā dhūmasya pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ vyāptiriti nyāyaḥ //
T11bsa072_u:1032: atha eko nityaḥ sarvajña ityādiviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭabuddhimatpūrvakatvaṃ sādhyate,
T11bsa072_u:1033: tadā evaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭena sādhyena saha kāryatvasya sādhanasya dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi pramāṇena vyāpterasiddheranaikāntikatvam /
T11bsa072_u:1034: atha sāmānyena vyāptimādāya viśeṣasya pakṣadharmatābalāt siddhirucyate?
T11bsa072_u:1036: yena sādhyagatena viśeṣaṇena vinā hetorvṛttirdharmiṇi na ghaṭate,
T11bsa072_u:1041: tadvad buddhimato 'pi śarīrādivṛttitvaṃ yadi sidhyati, siddhyatu /
T11bsa072_u:1052: kīṭakādīnāṃ ca hetutvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadapi kathaṃ vāryate?
T11bsa072_u:1055: tasmāt sādhyasādhanayoḥ sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptirdṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi pramāṇenāvaśyaṃ darśayitavyeti sthitam /
T11bsa072_u:1061: nanu sādharmyavati sādhanavākye anvaya evoktaḥ na tu vyatirekaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1064: tatkathamābhyāṃ trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ kathyata iti cet,
T11bsa072_u:1068: vyatirekāgṛhītau ca sādhyābhāve 'pi na sādhanābhāva iti viparyayaḥ sambhāvayitavyaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1072: anvayagṛhītau hi sādhanaṃ ca syāt sādhyaṃ ca na bhavediti viparyayaḥ sambhāvayitavyaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1073: evaṃ ca vyatireka eva na bhavet /
T11bsa072_u:1079: tadubhayaṃ sukhāvabodhārtha kathyate - svabhāvahetoḥ sattvalakṣaṇasya kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiḥ sādhyadharmiṇyeva grahītavyeti kecit /
T11bsa072_u:1083: sattvādanyeṣāṃ svabhāvahetūnāṃ kāryahetūnāmanupalambhahetūnāṃ ca dṛṣṭānta eva vyāptirgrahītavyā /
T11bsa072_u:1087: sādhyaviparyayabādhakapramāṇena vā kramayaugapadyanivṛttilakṣaṇena svasaṃvedanasāmarthyasiddhervikalpasiddhervā vastutvāvastutvābhyāṃ sandihyamāne vipakṣe dharmiṇi,
T11bsa072_u:1090: , anupalambhasya tu asadvyavahārayogyatvena saha vyāptiḥ pratyakṣeṇaiva /
T11bsa072_u:1091: , anyeṣāṃ tu svabhāvahetūnāṃ kāryahetūnāṃ vā keṣāñcit,
T11bsa072_u:1099: ayaṃ heturaparajīvaccharīre ātmanā vyāpta iti na niścitaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1100: ghaṭe ca vipakṣe ātmano 'bhāvānnivṛtta iti na niścitaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1101: dharmiṇi tu jīvaccharīre vidyata iti asādhāraṇānaikāntika ucyate /
T11bsa072_u:1110: sattvasya kṣaṇikatvena saha vyāptiḥ prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparpayābhyāṃ grahītavyeti,
T11bsa072_u:1115: tathā hi - yadanekavṛtti tadanekaṃ yathā anekabhājanagataṃ tālapham /
T11bsa072_u:1125: asyāyamarthaḥ - vyāpyavyāpakayoḥ sambandhe sati yadi vyāpakaṃ neṣyate tadā vyāpyamapi neṣyatām /
T11bsa072_u:1127: vādinā sādhanā upanyaste prativādinā tatra dūṣaṇaṃ vaktavyamiti nyāyaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1136: vaiyarthyaṃ tu yatropanyasyate tatra sandigdhasādhyadharmakatvaṃ hetorlakṣaṇaṃ hetau na sambhavatīti asiddha ucyate /
T11bsa072_u:1140: na hi hetoḥ sāmarthya nāma hetusvarūpādanyat /
T11bsa072_u:1145: yatra tu dharmiṇi sādhyaṃ sādhayitumārabdhaṃ tasya dharmiṇaḥ pramāṇabādhitve āśrayāsiddhirhetordūṣaṇam /
T11bsa072_u:1151: tena ca yadi nāma viśvaṃ vyāptaṃ tadapi yadupabhogāyatanatayā pareṇa parigṛhītaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ tadeva sātmakamabhidhīyata iti /
T11bsa072_u:1156: mānasasyāpyahaṃpratyayasya śarīrādiviṣayatvāt gauro 'haṃ sthūlo 'haṃ gacchāmyahamityādyākāreṇa ahaṃ pratyaya utpadyate yadāha alaṅkārakāraḥ
T11bsa072_u:1159: na cāsya śarīravyatiriktasya taddharmo gauratvaṃ sthūlatvaṃ vā /
T11bsa072_u:1160: na ca vibhoramūrttasya mūrtadravyānuvidhāyinī gamanakriyā yuktimatī /
T11bsa072_u:1161: na cāyaṃ māṇavake siṃhapratyaya eva bhākto yuktaḥ,
T11bsa072_u:1173: yadi bodharūpo nityaśca tadā cakṣurādivaiphalyaprasaṅgo durvāraḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1176: athābodharūpo dṛśyaśca tadānupalambho 'sya sattāṃ na kṣamata iti nirātmasiddhiranavadyā /
T11bsa072_u:1185: tathā hi - na svalakṣaṇābhyāṃ vyāptirgrahītuṃ śakyā /
T11bsa072_u:1188: tatra ca yadi sādhanaṃ sādhyena vyāptaṃ na pratīyate tadā sādhanaṃ ca syāt sādhyaṃ ca na syādityanaikāntikameva bhavati //
T11bsa072_u:1192: tatkathaṃ sādhyasādhanasāmānyābhyāṃ sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptiḥ pramāṇena gṛhyate?
T11bsa072_u:1194: yato yādṛśaṃ sāmānyaṃ paraiḥ parikalpyate tādṛśaṃ pramāṇena bādhyata iti nābhyupeyate tatsaugataiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1197: yathādhyavasāyaṃ bāhya eva ghaṭādirartha apoha ityabhidhīyate,
T11bsa072_u:1200: apohyate pṛthak kriyate 'smin buddhyākāre vijātīyamiti kṛtvā /
T11bsa072_u:1206: yattu gopratītau na gavātmā agavātmeti sāmarthyādapohaḥ paścānniścīyata iti vidhivādināṃ matam /
T11bsa072_u:1207: anyāpohapratipattau ca sāmarthyādanyapoḍho gavādirartho 'vadhāryata iti nivṛttyapohavādināṃ matam /
T11bsa072_u:1210: na hi vidhiṃ pratipadya kaścidarthāpattitaḥ paścādapohamavagacchati,
T11bsa072_u:1216: yathā nīlotpalasaṃketitendīvaraśabdāt utpalapratītau tatkāla eva nīlamasphuraṇamanivāryaṃ
T11bsa072_u:1217: tathā gośabdādapyagavāpoḍha eva vastuni saṃketitāt gopratītau tulyakālameva viśeṣaṇatvāt
T11bsa072_u:1222: kathaṃ tarhi anyaparihāreṇa pratipattā gavi vartatām /
T11bsa072_u:1230: kiñca svalakṣaṇātmani vastuni vācye sarvātmanā pratipatteḥ vidhiniṣedhayorayogaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1236: tasmāt paramārthato na svalakṣaṇaṃ śabdairabhidhīyata iti sthitam //
T11bsa072_u:1237: nanu yathā pratyakṣeṇa ghaṭasvarūpe gṛhīte 'paścāttatraiva kṣaṇikatvādiniścayārtha pramāṇāntaraṃ pravartate,
T11bsa072_u:1238: tathā vṛkṣaśabdena vṛkṣatvāṃśe pratipādite satvāṃśaniścayārthameva sadādipadaprayogo bhaviṣyatīti cet, na /
T11bsa072_u:1241: gṛhīte svarūpe kiṃ pramāṇāntareṇa paraṃ grahītavyamiti //
T11bsa072_u:1244: anekavyaktisamavetaṃ dṛśyamekaṃ nityaṃ tādṛśasya sattāsādhakaṃ na kiñcitpramāṇāmupalabhāmahe /
T11bsa072_u:1246: tathā hi - gavādivyaktyanubhavakāle varṇāsaṃsthānādyātmakaṃ vyaktisvarūpamapahāya nānyat kiñcidekamanuyāyi pratyakṣe bhāsate /
T11bsa072_u:1253: dṛṣṭaṃ cedaṃ sāmarthyaṃ bhedāviśeṣe 'pi kāsāñcideva vyaktīnām /
T11bsa072_u:1257: kiñca sarvagate vijātīyād vyāvṛtte satyapi sāmānye kiṃ bhedāviśeṣe 'pi govyaktiṣveva
T11bsa072_u:1258: samavetaṃ tat sāmānyaṃ tatraiva caikākārāṃ buddhiṃ janayatīti praśne svabhāvenaivetyuttaraṃ parasya /
T11bsa072_u:1274: svarūpavān ghaṭa ityādivat gotvādijātimān piṇḍa iti parikalpitabhedamupādāya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣya bhāvasyeṣṭatvāt /
T11bsa072_u:1279: sāmānyasya niṣedhāya prayogaḥ punarevaṃ kartavyaḥ - yadyatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate tattatra asadvyavahāraviṣayaḥ,
T11bsa072_u:1281: nopalabhyate copalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sāmānyaṃ paridṛśyamānāsu vyaktiṣviti svabhāvānupalabdhiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1283: varṇasaṃsthānalakṣaṇaṃ vyaktisvarūpamapahāya dvitīyasyānuyāyino rūpasya nipuṇamapi nirūpyamāṇasya sarvathā darśanābhāvāt,
T11bsa072_u:1291: tasmāt sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ vastu paraparikalpitasāmānyena śūnyamiti sthitam //
T11bsa072_u:1294: tathā hi - asya jagataḥ karttā bhavan nityo vā bhavedanityo vā /
T11bsa072_u:1296: nitye karttari samarthe sati sargasthitipralayānāṃ niyamena yaugapadyaprasaṅgāt /
T11bsa072_u:1297: yena hi svarūpeṇa sthitipralayayoḥ sa karttā tadasya svarūpaṃ sargakāle 'pi sannihitamiti tadaiva sthitipralayau kuryāt /
T11bsa072_u:1299: na hi nityena sahakāriṇā kadācidapyayaṃ virahitaḥ sadā sannihitatvāt /
T11bsa072_u:1306: ucyate - tā apīcchāḥ svasattāmātranibandhanāḥ kiṃ na karotīti sa evāsyopālambhaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1307: atha svarūpeṇa sāmarthye satyapi eṣa eva tasya svabhāvaḥ,
T11bsa072_u:1309: tarhi mātāpi sati vandhyā sā prakṛtyaivaitadapi vaktavyaṃ bhavedbhavatāmiti yatkiñcidetat //
T11bsa072_u:1313: samartho hi sahakāryapekṣāmanādṛtya balādeva kāryaṃ kuryāt /
T11bsa072_u:1315: nityasya kramakāritvaniṣedhanam nāpi nityaḥ krameṇa kāryakārīti yuktam,
T11bsa072_u:1320: etena ātmādīnāmakṣaṇikānāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ kṣaṇikānāṃ ca krameṇa kāryakaraṇaṃ pratyuktam /
T11bsa072_u:1328: janmavināśāvadhipratibhāsaprasaṅgāditi nedaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pūrvāparakālavyāptamarthaṃ kañcidapi grahītumalam /
T11bsa072_u:1335: atha mataṃ bhavedidaṃ smaraṇaṃ yadidānīntanamavasthānaṃ na sākṣātkuryāt,
T11bsa072_u:1346: yena hi svarūpeṇa smaraṇaṃ na tena svarūpeṇa grahaṇamityanunmattena śakyate vaktum /
T11bsa072_u:1353: prayogaścaivam - yaḥ pratyabhijñāpratyayaḥ sa tattvato naikālambanaḥ,
T11bsa072_u:1355: pratyabhijñā pratyayaścāyaṃ tadevedaṃ nīlādīti pratyaya iti viruddhavyāptopalabdhiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1359: na ca keśādiṣvapi sāmānyālambanatayā ekālambanatvam keśādivyaktereva pratyabhijñāyamānatvāt /
T11bsa072_u:1367: yadi nityaḥ kartā jagato na kāraṇaṃ,
T11bsa072_u:1372: karmajaṃ hi jagaduktamaśeṣaṃ karma cittamavadhūya na cāsti // iti //
T11bsa072_u:1383: saṅkalparuḍhānāṃ caturāryasatyaviṣayākārāṇāṃ dharmiṇāṃ cetoguṇamātrasya ca hetoḥ pratyātmavedyatvāt /
T11bsa072_u:1390: tathā hi - vyāptyadhikaraṇe kāmāturavartini yuvatyākāre sādaranirantaradīrghakālābhyāsasahitacetoguṇāt pūrvamanupalabdhiḥ sphuṭābhatvasya paścādabhyāsasaṃvedanaṃ,
T11bsa072_u:1391: sphuṭābhasaṃvedanamiti trividhapratyakṣānupalambhasādhyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sphuṭapratibhāsābhyāsa sahitacittākārayorityupapannā sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1393: nanvanena sādhanena caturāryasatyākārāṇāṃ sākṣātkaraṇāt caturāryasatyākārasākṣatkārī vivakṣitassarvajñaḥ sidhyati,
T11bsa072_u:1410: syādetat / anekabhavaparamparālakṣaṇena dīrghakālena bhāvyasya saṅkalpāruḍhasya sphuṭābhatvaṃ sambhāvyate /
T11bsa072_u:1419: iha pūrvajanmābhyāsāt tapodānādhyayanādau sarvasattvānāmabhyāse pravṛttiriti pravādaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1420: tatastatsiddhaye pramāṇamucyate - yaccittaṃ tat cittāntarapūrvakaṃ yathedānīntanaṃ cittam /
T11bsa072_u:1440: yadi saṃvedyate nīlaṃ kathaṃ bāhyaṃ taducyate /
T11bsa072_u:1441: na cetsaṃvedyate nīlaṃ kathaṃ bāhyaṃ taducyate //
T11bsa072_u:1445: na hi sarvatra sarvadā nīlādaya ākārāḥ prakāśante /
T11bsa072_u:1448: tasmādasti kiñcideṣāṃ samanantarapratyayavyatiriktaṃ yadbalena kvacit kadācit bhavantīti śakyamavasātum /
T11bsa072_u:1455: na cāsati samavāyini dravye samavāya iti tadduṣaṇamatra nādriyate /
T11bsa072_u:1456: dravyaṃ ca pṛthivyāpastejovāyurākāśaṃ kālo digātmā mana iti navavidham /
T11bsa072_u:1485: yatra hi sapratighaṃ dravyamasti na tatrākāśamavakāśaṃ vā dadāti /
T11bsa072_u:1486: yatra nāsti tatra tadabhāvādevāvakāśaḥ siddha iti kva vākāśamavakāśaṃ dadyāt?
T11bsa072_u:1487: [yasmādavakāśapradamākāśaṃ bhaṇyate] tasmāt satyasmin sarvadā sarvathā sarvatrāvakāśaḥ syāt /
T11bsa072_u:1492: taccaikamiti cet samānadeśatvāt sarvaśabdānāṃ vibhāgena śravaṇaṃ na syāt /
T11bsa072_u:1499: yadi punarmano [nityaṃ] syāttadānīmetāni jñānāni na yujyante /
T11bsa072_u:1504: tatra yo 'vayavī ghaṭādiḥ paramāṇubhidvaryaṇukādi krameṇārabdhaḥ prasiddhaḥ,
T11bsa072_u:1506: yadyavayavī nāsti kathaṃ tarhyayamekatvena pratibhāsata iti cet -
T11bsa072_u:1514: tasmādyo 'yaṃ nīlādiprabhāso nānādeśavyāpitvenānubhūyate sa eva sthūlapratibhāsa ityadoṣaḥ ye 'pi tadārambhakāḥ paramāṇavo vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ,
T11bsa072_u:1520: yo hyasya svabhāvaḥ pūrvaparamāṇupratyāsannaḥ na sa evāparaparamāṇupratyāsanno ghaṭate /
T11bsa072_u:1522: evaṃ ca sa pūrvaparamāṇusannihitasvabhāvo 'paraparamāṇuṃ pratyāsīdedyadi so 'pi tatra syāt /
T11bsa072_u:1531: tathā hi - yadyasau sāṃśaḥ kathaṃ paramāṇuḥ?
T11bsa072_u:1532: atha niraṃśaḥ tadā saṃyuktāḥ paramāṇāvaḥ sarvātmanā saṃyogāt parasparamabhinnadeśāḥ syuriti sarvaḥ piṇḍaḥ paramāṇumātraṃ syāt,
T11bsa072_u:1536: `dharottaradakṣiṇottaraparamāṇupratyāsannānāṃ svabhābānāṃ ca bheda iti ṣaḍaṃśataiva paramāṇornyāyabalādāpatati / yadāha -
T11bsa072_u:1540: na caikāsiddhau anekasyāpi siddhiriti na santi paramāṇavaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1541: yadi bāhyo 'rtho nāsti kiṃ viṣayastarhyayaṃ pratibhāsaḥ?
T11bsa072_u:1542: pratibhāsaḥ khalveṣo 'nādivitathavāsanātaḥ pravartamāno nirālambana eva lakṣyate /
T11bsa072_u:1543: tathā hi - sati viṣaye sālambanatā syāt /
T11bsa072_u:1546: sa cāyamubhayo 'pyanantarokta bādhakapramāṇa [grāha] grastavigraho na vyomatāmarasamatiśete yathoktam -
T11bsa072_u:1555: yathaikasmādākāśakeśadarśanāt dvitīyam [jñānaṃ] anālambanācca svapnajñānādaviśiṣṭaṃ vivādāspadībhūtaṃ jāgradvijñānamiti svabhāvahetuḥ //
T11bsa072_u:1557: yadi bāhyo 'rtho nāsti kiṃ tarhi paramārthasat?
T11bsa072_u:1567: tatra kecidevamāhuḥ - vijñānamevedaṃ sarva sarvaśarīraviṣayabhāvena prasiddham,
T11bsa072_u:1568: tacca svasaṃvedanamiti na kasyacit grāhyaṃ grāhakaṃ vā /
T11bsa072_u:1572: anye tu sakalākārakalaṅkānaṅkitaṃ śuddhasphaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ vāstavaṃ vijñānam /
T11bsa072_u:1574: tasmāt grāhyaṃ nāma nāstyeva grāhyābhāvāt tadapekṣayā yadgrāhakatvaṃ vijñānasya tadapi nāstīti /
T11bsa072_u:1575: mādhyamikānāṃ tu darśane tadapi vijñānaṃ na paramārthasat,
T11bsa072_u:1577: svabhāvena hi yuktaṃ pāramārthika mucyate loke /
T11bsa072_u:1585: yasmādekamanekaṃ vā rūpaṃ teṣu na vidyate' // iti //
T11bsa072_u:1587: `yadā tu na vikalpasya na cānyasya pramāṇatā /
T11bsa072_u:1591: prayogaḥ punarevam - yadekānekasvabhāvaṃ na bhavati na tatparamārthasat,
T11bsa072_u:1593: ekānekasvabhāvaṃ ca na bhavati vijñānamiti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1595: sākāre jñāne bahirartha iva ekānesvabhāvāyogyatvasya parisphuṭatvāt /
T11bsa072_u:1596: yatra hi lokasya bāhyārthavyavahārastadeva sākāravādino jñānam,
T11bsa072_u:1597: tato yattasya bahirbhāve bādhakaṃ tadevāntarbhāve 'pi bādhakam /
T11bsa072_u:1599: vijñānātmakānāmayamākāro yadyekaḥ sthūlo yati vānekaḥ paramāṇuśo bhinnaḥ,
T11bsa072_u:1607: śrīmanmahājagaddalavihārīya mahāpaṇḍita bhikṣumokṣākaraguptaviracitāyāṃ tarkabhāṣāyaṃ parārthānumānaparicchedaḥ tṛtīyaḥ samāptaḥ //
T11bsa072_u:1611: * yādṛśaṃ pustake dṛṣṭaṃ tādṛśaṃ likhitaṃ mayā /
T11bsa072_u:1612: yadi śuddhamaśuddhaṃ vā mama doṣo na dīyate //
